chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
aecfli: append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
olpti: one_leader_per_term_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h h' : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h')) -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> type (snd (nwState net h')) = Leader -> h = h'

Premises:
Record one_leader_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leader_per_term_interface { one_leader_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leader_per_term net } Arguments one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Notation type := (RaftState.type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Record append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface { append_entries_came_from_leaders_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> append_entries_came_from_leaders net } Arguments append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface { leaderLogs_term_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_term_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate net } Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record one_leaderLog_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leaderLog_per_term_interface { one_leaderLog_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term net; one_leaderLog_per_term_log_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_log net; one_leaderLog_per_term_host_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_host net } Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leaderLog_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Candidate -> t < currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
appendEntries_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader ->...-> Prop Arguments appendEntries_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
one_leader_per_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h h' : Net.name, currentTerm (nwState net h) = currentTerm (nwState net h') -> type (nwState net h) = Leader -> type (nwState net h') = Leader -> h = h' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments one_leader_per_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> t <= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> update_elections_data_input h inp (nwState net h) = gd -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h') ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_client_request h (nwState net h) client id c -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
RRIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = (d, l) -> update_elections_data_net (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = gd -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) (gd, d) h) ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

one_leaderLog_per_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll ll' : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> h = h' /\ ll = ll' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

handleRequestVoteReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' <> Candidate) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true)
